intro.p: This is the 0.6.0 release of the GStreamer Player. It should be used with the 0.6.x series of GStreamer and GStreamer Plugins.

GThe player is now rather mature and should be be able to play back all media supported by the GStreamer framework including mp3, ogg, flac, mpeg, avi, vob, mod and others. While it does support audio formats it is designed to primarly be a video player.

features.features: GUI support for choosing video effects
GUI support for choosing Music Visualisation
License mostly canged to LGPL. Playlist is still GPL.
